entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor(api): simplify response structures for GetDocuments and GetDâ€¦ by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.11.0...v0.11.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update eslint monorepo to v9.20.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/200
  • Fix/update correspondent to not fail by @spamsch in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/202
  • chore(deps): update dependency @vitejs/plugin-react-swc to v3.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/204
  • Removed Docker Version by @kaindlnetwork in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/201
  • chore(deps): update dependency eslint-plugin-react-refresh to v0.4.19 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/203
  • Removed deprecated compose version by @kaindlnetwork in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/206

New Contributors

  • @spamsch made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/202
  • @kaindlnetwork made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.11.1...v0.11.2

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Google Document AI
entry.content:
Support for Google Document AI

The first non-LLM AI document service is supported with this version: Google Document AI. This breakthrough will enable easy implementation of other OCR providers! ðŸš€

You want to have another Cloud AI OCR service supported? Write into the discussion of this release and let me know :)

What's Changed

  • Google Document AI by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/208

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.11.2...v0.12.0

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update module github.com/gabriel-vasile/mimetype to v1.4.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/209
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.220.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/210
  • fix(ocr): fix the auto-tag trigger for OCR by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/216

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.12.0...v0.12.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.12.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript-eslint to v8.24.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/215
  • Set Fixed Alpine Version by @kaindlnetwork in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/217
  • Enhance Readme Variables Table by @kaindlnetwork in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/221
  • refactor: Improve auto-tagging process to skip OCR-tagged documents by @mkrinke in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/227
  • chore(deps): update dependency eslint to v9.20.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/228
  • feat: Add TLS configuration support for HTTPS connections in Paperless client by @mkrinke in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/230
  • chore(deps): update dependency globals to v15.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/232
  • fix(deps): update module cloud.google.com/go/documentai to v1.35.2 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/233
  • chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.24.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/234
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v22.13.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/236
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.221.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/235
  • chore(deps): update dependency alpine_3_21/musl-dev to v1.2.5-r9 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/246
  • feat: add custom HTTP transport with headers for OpenAI client by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/245

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.12.1...v0.12.2
